Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV19.name: _rotated(around:byDegrees:)
Extensions/CGPoint.html#/s:So7CGPointV19.abstract: Rotate this point around a given point, by an angle given in degrees.

Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.name: _resized(toMaximumSize:)
Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.abstract: This allows an image to be resized, given a maximum dimension, and a scale will be determined to meet that dimension.

Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.name: _resized(toScaleFactor:)
Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.abstract: This allows an image to be resized, given a maximum dimension, and a scale will be determined to meet that dimension.

Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.name: _resized(toNewWidth:toNewHeight:)
Extensions/UIImage.html#/s:So7UIImageC19.abstract: This allows an image to be resized, given both a width and a height, or just one of the dimensions.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _originalBackgroundColor
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: This caches the original background color. It is set at load time.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _originalTintColor
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: This caches the original tint color. It is set at load time.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _gradientLayer
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: This caches the gradient layer. This is set when the gradient is redrawn.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _gradientAngleInDegrees
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: The angle of the gradient, in degrees.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _fetchGradientLayer
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: This returns the background gradient layer, rendering it, if necessary.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.name: _makeGradientLayer()
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/s:19RV.abstract: This creates the gradient layer, using our specified start and stop colors.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/c:@CM@.name: gradientEndColor
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: The ending color. If not provided, then the starting color is used.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/c:@CM@.name: gradientAngleInDegrees
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: The angle of the gradient, in degrees. 0 (default) is top-to-bottom.

Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html.name: RVS_RetroLEDDisplay
Classes/RVS_RetroLEDDisplay.html.abstract: The display is a subclass of UIImageView. We do this, so we can easily have a background image.
